site para crc = http://ghsi.de/CRC/index.php?Polynom=1100010110011001&Message=100

Frames CAN para teste - Os frames não estão com intermission. 

ID_A - 0x0672 rtr=0 ide =0 dlc = 8	data = AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA	CRC 000000001010001 (ACK=ok)(até EOF) (bit stuffing apenas no crc)
0110011100100001000101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101000001000010100011011111111

ID_A - 0x0449 srr = 1 ide =1 id_b =0x3007A (stuff)  rtr =0 dlc = 8	data = AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA	CRC 000011111111011 (ACK=ok)(até EOF)
010001001001111100000100000111110010000100010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010000110011001011111111

Frame Wikipedia 'stuffado' (dlc =1)
00000100101000001000100000100101000011000001001011111111

Overload apos um ACK Error (É possível?)
